org.restlet.ext.atom

Class Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.ext.atom.Text

  • public class Text
extends java.lang.Object
    A Text construct contains human-readable text, usually in small quantities. The content of Text constructs is Language-Sensitive.
    Author:
    Jerome Louvel
